text:
In the execute stage details sidebar:

1. Remove "Task" text in the header
2. It looks like the task description is getting truncated?
3. Instead of showing the feedback ID, show a collapsible section "Source feedback" that shows the whole original feedback card.

proposedTasks.title: Fix task detail sidebar header and description display
proposedTasks.description:
In the Execute phase task detail sidebar:
1. Remove the redundant "Task" text from the sidebar header  the header should show only the task title.
2. Fix task description truncation  the full description must be visible. If the description is long, it should scroll within the sidebar rather than being clipped. Acceptance criteria: (a) no "Task" label in the detail sidebar header, (b) full task description renders without truncation, with vertical scrolling if content exceeds the viewport.

proposedTasks.title: Show collapsible 'Source feedback' section in task detail sidebar
proposedTasks.description: When a task was created from Eval feedback (i.e. the task's bead has a `discovered-from` dependency linking back to a feedback item), replace the raw feedback ID display with a collapsible "Source feedback" section. When expanded, render the full original feedback card (feedback text, category badge, mapped plan, timestamp) inline in the sidebar. The section should default to collapsed. If the task has no associated feedback, omit the section entirely. Acceptance criteria: (a) feedback ID string no longer shown, (b) collapsible section titled "Source feedback" appears for feedback-originated tasks, (c) expanded section displays the complete original feedback card content, (d) section is absent for tasks not originating from feedback.

taskTitles: Fix task detail sidebar header and description display
Show collapsible 'Source feedback' section in task detail sidebar
